name: Sonic Dash Remastered 2
description:
Sonic dash remastered 2 is the sequel of Sonic dash remastered and is currently being development

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

We recommend using the itch.io client for installing Sonic Dash Remastered 2, as you can auto update games like Sonic Dash Remastered 2 without going onto itch.io

--------------- [Change log]----------------------------------------------

UPDATE: V 2.0.0 coming soon 1/5/17

The current build (1.0.0)

- Title screen

- 1 Level

- News (for the game) (currently not usuable)

- Added extras

- Fixed the swamp water (used to become purple)

- Removed the beta level (Casino Park)

- Bug fixes

- Added controls

- Added credits

--------------- [End of change log]---------------------------------------

Support

If you run into any issues while running the game or if you want to say Hi please contact us via the support email below
